result.markdown:
#  Multivariate Time Series
## VAR/VECM


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(readxl)
data1 <- read_excel("Data/Bab 4/VECM.xlsx")
tsdata = data1[,c(-1,-2,-3,-4)]
tsdata = ts(tsdata, start=c(2010,1), frequency=12)
plot(tsdata)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](04-Bab4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Stationary Test
library(aTSA)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```

Attaching package: 'aTSA'
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
The following object is masked from 'package:graphics':

    identify
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
adf.test(tsdata[,"LnIHK"])
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Augmented Dickey-Fuller Test 
alternative: stationary 
 
Type 1: no drift no trend 
     lag  ADF p.value
[1,]   0 3.25    0.99
[2,]   1 7.29    0.99
[3,]   2 3.75    0.99
[4,]   3 5.84    0.99
Type 2: with drift no trend 
     lag    ADF p.value
[1,]   0 -0.506   0.869
[2,]   1 -0.541   0.856
[3,]   2 -0.727   0.791
[4,]   3 -0.914   0.725
Type 3: with drift and trend 
     lag   ADF p.value
[1,]   0 -5.31  0.0100
[2,]   1 -2.02  0.5601
[3,]   2 -3.33  0.0732
[4,]   3 -1.77  0.6648
---- 
Note: in fact, p.value = 0.01 means p.value <= 0.01 
```

```{.r .cell-code}
# Lag Optimum
VARselect(tsdata, lag.max = 10)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
$selection
```

:::
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Cointegration Test
cointest_eigen = ca.jo(tsdata, K=2, type="eigen", ecdet="const", spec="longrun")
summary(cointest_eigen)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

###################### 
# Johansen-Procedure # 
###################### 

Test type: maximal eigenvalue statistic (lambda max) , without linear trend and constant in cointegration 

Eigenvalues (lambda):
[1]  5.404113e-01  2.481996e-01  6.245216e-02 -2.633450e-15

Values of teststatistic and critical values of test:

          test 10pct  5pct  1pct
r <= 2 |  5.03  7.52  9.24 12.97
r <= 1 | 22.25 13.75 15.67 20.20
r = 0  | 60.64 19.77 22.00 26.81

Eigenvectors, normalised to first column:
(These are the cointegration relations)

           LnIHK.l2    LnRM2.l2   LnIPI.l2   constant
LnIHK.l2  1.0000000  1.00000000  1.0000000  1.0000000
LnRM2.l2 -0.1153114  0.08719842 -1.0510635 -0.6085127
LnIPI.l2 -0.8107822 -1.31468643  0.2406645  0.1913803
constant  0.4060887  0.96758544  4.8089173  0.5277719

Weights W:
(This is the loading matrix)

           LnIHK.l2    LnRM2.l2    LnIPI.l2      constant
LnIHK.d -0.07391103 -0.02494780 -0.03114995 -2.277816e-13
LnRM2.d -0.06399547  0.08952368  0.07223974  4.294637e-13
LnIPI.d -0.01046286  0.46857303 -0.03192575  8.303978e-13
```


:::
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# VECM
modelvecm = cajorls(cointest_eigen)
```
:::




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
summary(modelvecm$rlm)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}


:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
modelvecm$beta
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
               ect1
LnIHK.l2  1.0000000
LnRM2.l2 -0.1153114
LnIPI.l2 -0.8107822
constant  0.4060887
```


:::
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
vecm = vec2var(cointest_eigen)
```
:::




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# IRF
ir = irf(vecm, n.ahead=48)
plot(ir)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](04-Bab4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672}
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](04-Bab4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-2.png){width=672}
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](04-Bab4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-3.png){width=672}
:::
:::




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# FEVD
vd = fevd(vecm, n.ahead=48)
plot(vd)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](04-Bab4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
vd_LnIHK = as.matrix(vd$LnIHK)
barplot(t(vd_LnIHK), beside=FALSE, main="FEVD LnIHK", xlab="periode", col=c("blue","red","green"), legend.text=TRUE) 
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](04-Bab4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
vd_LnRM2 = as.matrix(vd$LnRM2)
barplot(t(vd_LnRM2), beside=FALSE, main="FEVD LnRM2", xlab="periode", col=c("blue","red","green"), legend.text=TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](04-Bab4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
vd_LnIPI = as.matrix(vd$LnIPI)
barplot(t(vd_LnIPI), beside=FALSE, main="FEVD LnIPI", xlab="periode", col=c("blue","red","green"), legend.text=TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](04-Bab4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# VAR FD, If No cointegtration
D1LnIHK = diff(tsdata[,"LnIHK"])
D1LnRM2 = diff(tsdata[,"LnRM2"])
D1LnIPI = diff(tsdata[,"LnIPI"])
datadiff = cbind(D1LnIHK, D1LnRM2, D1LnIPI)
plot(datadiff)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](04-Bab4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-15-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
VARselect(datadiff, lag.max = 10)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}


```{.r .cell-code}
varfd = VAR(datadiff, p=3, type="both")
summary(varfd)
```

```{.r .cell-code}
# Matriks A for SVAR AB-model
a.mat = diag(3)
diag(a.mat) = NA
a.mat[2,1] = NA
a.mat[3,1] = NA
a.mat[3,2] = NA
a.mat
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
     [,1] [,2] [,3]
[1,]   NA    0    0
[2,]   NA   NA    0
[3,]   NA   NA   NA
```


:::
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Matriks B for SVAR AB-model
b.mat = diag(3)
diag(b.mat) = NA
b.mat
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
     [,1] [,2] [,3]
[1,]   NA    0    0
[2,]    0   NA    0
[3,]    0    0   NA
```


:::
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Est SVAR
svar1 = SVAR(var.est1, Amat = a.mat, Bmat = b.mat, max.iter = 10000, hessian = TRUE)
```

```
Warning in SVAR(var.est1, Amat = a.mat, Bmat = b.mat, max.iter = 10000, : The
```

```{.r .cell-code}

# The top 20 models according to the AIC
models$top_orders
```

```{.r .cell-code}
library(lmtest)
bgtest(ardl_3132) # Autocorrelation Test
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

	Breusch-Godfrey test for serial correlation of order up to 1

data:  ardl_3132
LM test = 1.1192, df = 1, p-value = 0.2901
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
bptest(ardl_3132) # Heteroscedasticity Test
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

	studentized Breusch-Pagan test

data:  ardl_3132
BP = 4.4815, df = 12, p-value = 0.9731
```

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Cointegration Test
fbounds <- bounds_f_test(ardl_3132, case = 2, alpha = 0.05)
fbounds$tab
```

```{.r .cell-code}
summary(uecm_3132)
```

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Stability
uecm_3132_lm_names <- to_lm(uecm_3132, fix_names = TRUE)
fluctuation <- efp(uecm_3132_lm_names$full_formula, 
                   data = uecm_3132_lm_names$model)
plot(fluctuation)
```
